attributes.action: either call a general election or resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since Gordon Brown took over as Prime Minister he has headed a government of disaters culminating in losing 25m peoples data. He was not elected by the public and should therefore resign or call an immediate general election. Failure to do so will show that he has lost all respect form the public

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
